attributes.action: freedom of speech on any subject.
attributes.additional_details:
Freedom of speech on any subject, after all that's what we went through two World Wars for.
 Its hypocrital that politicians pay lip service to the war dead on Remembrance Day but then trample over the freedom of speech they won for everybody. We need to make it plain that freedom of speech is a god given right to everyone and that no man made laws can take that away from them.
